metadata.title: CVE-2017-15288 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The compilation daemon in Scala before 2.10.7, 2.11.x before 2.11.12, and 2.12.x before 2.12.4 uses weak permissions for private files in /tmp/scala-devel/${USER:shared}/scalac-compile-server-port, which allows local users to write to arbitrary class files and consequently gain privileges.

criterions.comment: scala package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.12-2').
